title: Music's Harmonies & Tuning:  Fundamental, Proportional, Relational and a Repository of Meaning
description:
Travis Woyen, musician, and Karen, artist, discuss musical harmonies, the crossover with light and color in visual art, how harmonics relate to mathematics and physics, springing out of a shared interest in Boethius.

Previous conversations with Travis Woyen:
https://youtu.be/ImexUPpQlmA
https://youtu.be/_52mzQQROsI

Travis's Youtube channel: You'll find his music here.
I especially like Entering a New Age (the Vicar)
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6sTf5I1_5VP3fQ1dke7WdQ

The Diabolus in Musica video:  https://youtu.be/3MhwGnq4N9o
